item.title: Getting Started with Box3D
item.description:
Okay, so I’ve decided to embark on what’s probably going to be the most challenging engineering project I’ve undertaken so far: I’m going to fork Box2D, the popular 2D physics engine, and extend it to support 3D physics.

Why? I’ve been a physics enthusiast since my college days, and I’ve dabbled in game development on and off for the past decade. I’ve always wanted to combine these passions, and creating my own physics engine is the obvious next step.
